result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaiah Gregory Thorpe

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Isaiah Gregory Thorpe in court.  Attorney Basil Martin Loeb in court for Isaiah Gregory Thorpe.  Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Final pretrial conference held.  Parties remain in trial posture. Atty. Loeb informed the court that the matter may resolve with a DPA. Jury trial remains scheduled on 11/07/2022 in Branch 1.

Defendant Isaiah Gregory Thorpe in court.  Attorney Basil Martin Loeb in court for Isaiah Gregory Thorpe.  
Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Matter set for final pretrial conference.  Atty. Loeb informed the Court there may be a DPA offered and requests another final pretrial date. Case is adjourned to Br. 1.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Isaiah Gregory Thorpe in court with attorney Black who appears for Basil Martin Loeb.  Constatine Siapkaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Isaiah Gregory Thorpe appeared by video means with Attorney.
Case in court for status. Defense requests final pre-trial and jury trial dates. Case adjourned to Br 01.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Isaiah Gregory Thorpe in court with attorney Basil Martin Loeb.  
Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Atty. Loeb has just received discovery and an offer and would like time to review it.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  Status conference scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Court ordered no possession or use of any  dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Isaiah Gregory Thorpe in court with attorney Basil Martin Loeb.  Dax Odom appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 01.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to Defendant's attorney. Defendant plead not guilty.  
Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 01.
 As to count 2: Court struck the penalty enhancer.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/12/2022@1:30pm
